parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set the task as a current task of the person.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object '''setCurrentTask''' task

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] - the unit having the task

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> task: [[Task]] - the task you want to select

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[setCurrentTask]] tskKillSpongebob;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[createSimpleTask]], [[simpleTasks]], [[currentTask]]
</value></part></template>
